title: 103_hr4691
content: Saltville Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Saltville Heritage Area in Virginia. Authorizes the Saltville Foundation to submit an integrated management plan to the Secretary of Interior which shall provide for the protection, enhancement, and interpretation of the cultural, natural, scenic, and recreational resources of the Area. Requires the Plan to specify a management entity for the Area. Authorizes the Secretary, upon concurrence with the Plan, to enter into cooperative agreements with such entity. Ceases the establishment of the Area and such authorization of the Secretary if, within 180 days after the enactment of this Act, a Heritage Compact for the Area is not: (1) submitted to, and approved by, the Secretary, and (2) submitted to the Congress.
